name: Slingshot

refinement_effect.refine_one: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 36%. Otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 42%. Otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.
refinement_effect.refine_three: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 48%. Otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.
refinement_effect.refine_four: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 54%. Otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.
refinement_effect.refine_five: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 60%. Otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.

description: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.
